author: mschaaf
msg: Changed the Zookeeper based discovery so that it is now able to discover services without an objectClass set in the scope.
Changed the local discovery bundle to export a utility class which is needed by the distributed discovery to generate and to parse the XML format used in the Zookeeper nodes.
